scripts.deploy: (yarn run buidler deploy --export '../dapp/network.json') && yarn run copy-interface-artifacts
scripts.deploy:ganache: (yarn run buidler deploy --network ganache --export '../dapp/network.json') && yarn run copy-interface-artifacts
scripts.deploy:fork: (yarn run buidler deploy --network fork --export '../dapp/network.json') && yarn run copy-interface-artifacts
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: (yarn run buidler deploy --network rinkeby --verbose --export '../dapp/network.rinkeby.json') && yarn run copy-interface-artifacts
scripts.deploy:mainnet: (yarn run buidler deploy --network mainnet --verbose --export '../dapp/network.mainnet.json') && yarn run copy-interface-artifacts
scripts.node:ganache: yarn run ganache-cli -h localhost -p 7546 -m 'replace hover unaware super where filter stone fine garlic address matrix basic'
scripts.node:fork: yarn run ganache-cli -f $PROVIDER_URL -h localhost -p 7545 -m 'replace hover unaware super where filter stone fine garlic address matrix basic' -u 0x3f5CE5FBFe3E9af3971dD833D26bA9b5C936f0bE -u 0x52BEBd3d7f37EC4284853Fd5861Ae71253A7F428 -u 0xAed9fDc9681D61edB5F8B8E421f5cEe8D7F4B04f --keepAliveTimeout 0 --forkCacheSize -1 --verbose
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:js && yarn run lint:sol
scripts.prettier: yarn run prettier:js && yarn run prettier:sol
scripts.fund: yarn run buidler --network ganache run scripts/utils/fund.js
scripts.fund:fork: yarn run buidler --network fork run scripts/utils/fund.js
scripts.setup:fork: rm -rf deployments/fork* && cp -r deployments/mainnet deployments/fork_1337 && yarn run fund:fork && yarn run deploy:fork
scripts.clean: rm -rf artifacts && rm -rf deployments/ganache* && rm -rf deployments/local* && rm -rf cache
